content: Wickedness of Humanity and Goodness of God.
For the music director.  of David the servant of the LORD.
There is no fear of God before his eyes.
For it flatters him in his  eyes
Concerning the discovery of his wrongful deed  the hatred .
The words of his mouth are wickedness and deceit;
He has ceased to be wise  to do good.
He plans wickedness on his bed;
He sets himself on a path that is not good;
